i work in a warehouse.
i love to travel.
I need to find a more constructive way to deal with my emotions.

participant_2.background:
I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests.
My parents were immigrants from Italy.
I run every day because I want to be healthy and set a good example for my younger sibling.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
i work full time.

content.text: Hello! I am doing great, thank you! How are you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am just working on a project. What do you do for work?
I am a full time artist, and I love it! I get to be creative everyday, which is my favorite part.
That is awesome! I love to be creative, but I do not have the talent to draw or paint.
You should try it! It is actually really fun, and you can do so many different things with it.
Maybe I will! Do you have any hobbies outside of work?
I love to run, and I collect music. I also like to travel, but I do not get to do it as much as I would like.
I love to travel too! I have been to a few different countries, but I would love to see more of the world.
I have been to Mexico, Canada, and France. I have always wanted to go to Italy!
Italy is beautiful! I have been to Rome and Venice, and I loved both of them.
I have heard amazing things about both of those places. I would love to go to Venice and see the canals.
Venice is definitely a must-see! It is so beautiful and unique.
